Testimonials

Sankeerthana quickly picked up the requirements of project which is very impressive for her age and current experience. She exceeded our expectations and was able to dive deeply into data to generate insights using advanced statistical analysis and identifying errors in ground truth data as well as areas where models could be improved.

Her work involved analyzing large sets of 2D Image data, conceptualizing, and developing Object detection models to support the project requirements.

Sankeerthana is a good Data Scientist with strong abilities to quickly learn new skills and knowledge. She was able to come up with various approaches when tackling problems demonstrating her strong technical and problem-solving skills.
Institute for Infocomm Research - A*STAR, Singapore
Working closely with our data analytics lead, she designed and implemented the first data dashboards for two key stakeholders of our new product. The solution helped us in acquiring our first 10 business customers. She was also able to quickly work with a new language and framework (Ruby on Rails) in order to embed her work in the main application which I found impressive.

She proved herself to be a quick and dedicated learner, traits which I can say, will serve her quite well for any organisation.
